text: 3.19: Jop 5.13; 1 Ko 1.20; 2.6Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, kha nuianan ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ, Fhe Bakɨme nta garim, nta ana rɨmani nɨman, nta ŋanŋangi tɨvi ma. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ mba tɨvi ga nzuai, “Gumgi mbari, mbe mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgir harigi gumgir muunga ndɨkndɨgi ki. Fhe Bakɨme mben tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbuim, nta wom mbera farfagi.”
